Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.observer

Interface ModelObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Summary
public interface ModelObserver
This interface implements the Observer-side of the paradigm. The class that implements it, has to redefine each method adding Summary-update procedures.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updateActiveLeaders​(String nickname, LeaderCard activeLeader)
    This method, when called, updates the active leaders' state of the requested player in the summary.

  • Method Details

    • updateMarket

      void updateMarket​(Market market)
      This method, when called, updates the market in the summary.
      Parameters:
      market - the market

    • updateCardGrid

      void updateCardGrid​(CardGrid cardGrid)
      This method, when called, updates the card grid in the summary. It inserts into every slot the id of the top card and the depth of the stack (got from cardGrid.getGrid()[i][j].size()).
      Parameters:
      cardGrid - the card grid

    • updateLorenzoMarker

      void updateLorenzoMarker​(int lorenzoMarker)
      This method, when called, updates the lorenzo marker (if single-player) in the summary.
      Parameters:
      lorenzoMarker - the black marker

    • updateFaithPath

      void updateFaithPath​(List<Cell> faithPath)
      This method, when called, updates the faith path in the summary.
      Parameters:
      faithPath - the faith path

    • updateConnectionState

      void updateConnectionState​(String nickname, boolean connected)
      This method, when called, updates the personal board of the requested player in the summary.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      connected - the new state

      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      devCardSlots - the dev card slots array

    • updateHandLeaders

      void updateHandLeaders​(String nickname, List<LeaderCard> handLeaders)
      This method, when called, updates the hand leaders' state of the requested player in the summary. Used for the starting choice of leaders (this will be sent ONLY to the interested player).
      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      handLeaders - the hand leaders

    • updateHandLeadersDiscard

      void updateHandLeadersDiscard​(String nickname, LeaderCard handLeader)
      This method, when called, updates the hand leaders' state of the requested player in the summary.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      handLeader - the hand leader discarded

    • updateActiveLeaders

      void updateActiveLeaders​(String nickname, LeaderCard activeLeader)
      This method, when called, updates the active leaders' state of the requested player in the summary.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      activeLeader - the activated leader

    • updateWhiteMarbleConversions

      void updateWhiteMarbleConversions​(String nickname, PhysicalResource whiteMarbleConversion)
      This update method receives the new conversion to add in the list of the others.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player who activated the conversion leader
      whiteMarbleConversion - the related conversion

    • updateDiscountMap

      void updateDiscountMap​(String nickname, DiscountMap discountMap)
      This method, when called, updates the discount map of the requested player in the summary.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      discountMap - the discount map

      nickname - the requested player
      tempDevCard - the temporary dev card

      tempProduction - the temporary production

    • updateLastUsedState

      void updateLastUsedState​(String nickname, StateName lastUsedState)
      This method, when called, updates the last used state in this player's summary, useful for disconnection in the middle of a complex operation ( such as Dev card buy, production, etc. ).
      Parameters:
      lastUsedState - the last used state
